item.description:
I'd like to host the meetup again at Grendel's. Looks like a nice location accesible to everyone.

Food is half price if ordered before 7PM together with a drink. Last time average tab was $15/person.

Please bring cash if possible. Grendel's doesn't want separate tabs for groups.

I'm limiting the initial number to 25. Please RSVP ONLY if you really think will attend, and release your place ASAP if your plans change.

Looking forward to see all of you again, and meet new members.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be downstairs from 6PM. I'll email my cell number the day before to the attendees.I

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Cultural Conversations between native and non-native English speakers
